Description: Python API for ISA conversions, validation and content creation
Visualization and search over collections of ISA-Tabs (browser)
Parse ISA-Tab into R data structures
Used with ISAcreator to develop ISA-Tab XML Configurations that are used as ISA-Tab templates and used for validating against domain-specific requirements
Used with ISA XML Configurations to validate ISA-Tab files against domain-specific requirements

Converter which can pull from ArrayExpress (by an accession number) or read local files and convert them to ISAtab.
